newsitem.title: USA: SPS Technologies president/COO to retire.
newsitem.headline: SPS Technologies president/COO to retire.

text.p: SPS Technologies Inc said on Wednesday that Harry Wilkinson would retire as president and chief operating officer, effective March 1.
Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Charles Grigg will assume the additional title of president, the company said.
Wilkinson, who has been with SPS for 31 years, would remain on the company's board and continue to represent SPS in certain fastener industry activities, it said.
